plot: Flight of the Hummingbird tells the tragic yet inspiring story of Sebastian. A man who's values are put to the test when he risks his life for the well being of a stranger.
title: El Vuelo del Colibrí
plot_es: Flight of the Hummingbird tells the tragic yet inspiring story of Sebastian. A man who's values are put to the test when he risks his life for the well being of a stranger.
